languages.text: "Я хотел бы сказать, что наводить порядок на палубе проще, чем разбираться с бардаком на Футфоле... Однако ваши подданые находят все новые способы удивлять меня своей неопрятностью".

traits.locale_text: "Я хотел бы сказать, что наводить порядок на палубе проще, чем разбираться с бардаком на Футфоле... Однако ваши подданые находят все новые способы удивлять меня своей неопрятностью".

languages.text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
languages.original_text: "Я хотел бы сказать, что наводить порядок на палубе проще, чем разбираться с бардаком на Футфоле... Однако ваши подданые находят все новые способы удивлять меня своей неопрятностью".

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to say that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
"I wanted to say that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
"I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
"I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
"I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

languages.text: “我猜打扫甲板总比处理落脚港上的烂摊子要好……不过，您的仆人总能找到新的方法让我大吃一惊，他们脏乱的举止总是能让我震惊不已。”
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

traits.locale_text: “我猜打扫甲板总比处理落脚港上的烂摊子要好……不过，您的仆人总能找到新的方法让我大吃一惊，他们脏乱的举止总是能让我震惊不已。”

languages.text: « Je me dis qu'il vaut mieux avoir à récurer le pont qu'à régler les problèmes de Castel... mais la capacité de vos serviteurs à tout salir et à semer le désordre ne manque jamais de me surprendre. »
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

traits.locale_text: « Je me dis qu'il vaut mieux avoir à récurer le pont qu'à régler les problèmes de Castel... mais la capacité de vos serviteurs à tout salir et à semer le désordre ne manque jamais de me surprendre. »

languages.text: 「フットフォールでの面倒ごとに対処するよりは、デッキを掃除する方がマシだと思いたいね…とは言え、君の下僕たちのだらしなさにはいつも驚かされるばかりだよ」
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールでの面倒ごとに対処するよりは、デッキを掃除する方がマシだと思いたいね…とは言え、君の下僕たちのだらしなさにはいつも驚かされるばかりだよ」

languages.text: «Quiero creer que limpiar la cubierta es preferible a ocuparme del desastre que es Paso... pero debo decir que sus sirvientes encuentran formas nuevas de sorprenderme con su desorden cada día».
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero creer que limpiar la cubierta es preferible a ocuparme del desastre que es Paso... pero debo decir que sus sirvientes encuentran formas nuevas de sorprenderme con su desorden cada día».

languages.text: "Ich will meinen, dass es immer noch besser ist, das Deck zu säubern, als sich mit dem Chaos auf Footfall herumzuschlagen ... Aber Eure Diener finden immer neue Wege, mich mit ihrer Unordentlichkeit zu überraschen."
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will meinen, dass es immer noch besser ist, das Deck zu säubern, als sich mit dem Chaos auf Footfall herumzuschlagen ... Aber Eure Diener finden immer neue Wege, mich mit ihrer Unordentlichkeit zu überraschen."

languages.text: "Güverteyi temizlemenin, Binliman'daki keşmekeşle uğraşmaktan daha iyi olduğunu düşünecek oluyorum... Hizmetkârlarınız yeni bir dağınıklıkla aklımı alıveriyor."
languages.original_text: "I'd like to think that cleaning up the deck is better than dealing with the mess on Footfall... That said, your servants always find new ways to surprise me with their untidiness."
